articles.author: Ezza Ijaz
articles.title: After Shaking Up Search Engine Market With SearchGPT, OpenAI Is Now Gearing Up To Challenge Google With Its Own Web Browser - Wccftech
articles.description: OpenAI is reportedly working on bringing its own web browser to be integrated with its chatbot and could potentially take on Google
articles.content: OpenAI has been arduously working on evolving its technology by bringing major upgrades to its models and developing new platforms offering even more advanced capabilities. The company has been rapid… [+2404 chars]
